nodesData.tooltip: Root node of the roadmap

nodesData.label: Packaging Material Library
nodesData.tooltip: Central source of truth for packaging data

nodesData.label: Supplier Management
nodesData.tooltip: Supplier communication and document management

nodesData.label: General
nodesData.tooltip: Core platform capabilities

nodesData.label: Innovation Pipeline
nodesData.tooltip: Future platform capabilities under consideration

nodesData.label: Material Library - Basic
nodesData.tooltip: Central command centre for packaging materials data, enabling teams to explore, analyse, and manage their complete packaging portfolio through a single, intuitive interface.

nodesData.label: Data Quality Scoring System
nodesData.tooltip: Transparent scoring system that guides data improvement priorities and enables fit-for-purpose decisions about data usage, from compliance reporting to forecasting

nodesData.label: Enterprise Data Extensions
nodesData.tooltip: Enterprise-ready data flexibility allowing customers to extend Captr's core data model with their own fields and tags, while maintaining platform integrity and scalability

nodesData.label: Streamlined Supplier Hub
nodesData.tooltip: Central hub for supplier communications and specification management, making packaging information accessible to all team members without complex process changes

nodesData.label: Email-First Spec Capture
nodesData.tooltip: Frictionless specification capture through familiar business tools, making it easy for suppliers to provide packaging information through email or simple file uploads

nodesData.label: AI-Powered Data Generation
nodesData.tooltip: AI-powered generation of baseline packaging data from existing product information, enabling rapid platform adoption for large product catalogues without manual data entry bottlenecks

nodesData.label: Flexible Data Import Hub
nodesData.tooltip: Flexible data ingestion that meets customers where they are, transforming disparate data sources into actionable packaging information without requiring technical expertise from brands

nodesData.label: Automated Portfolio Analysis
nodesData.tooltip: Instant access to professional-grade packaging analysis that typically requires expensive consulting, powered by customer's own data on-file

nodesData.label: Business Intelligence Export
nodesData.tooltip: Flexible access to packaging data enabling teams to leverage existing business intelligence tools and processes

nodesData.label: AI Sustainability Co-pilot
nodesData.tooltip: AI-powered sustainability co-pilot providing continuous analysis and actionable recommendations based on packaging portfolio patterns

nodesData.label: Progressive Data Enhancement
nodesData.tooltip: Flexible menu of data improvement methods allowing teams to incrementally enhance their packaging data through a combination of automated tools, benchmarks, and collaborative options

nodesData.label: Basic Authentication
nodesData.tooltip: Essential user authentication and access control for early platform access

nodesData.label: SOC 2 Compliance
nodesData.tooltip: Core security framework implementation and SOC 2 compliance readiness

nodesData.label: Smart Compliance Engine
nodesData.tooltip: Automated compliance monitoring and reporting across multiple jurisdictions

nodesData.label: Financial Impact Tools
nodesData.tooltip: Comprehensive cost analysis and financial planning for packaging decisions

nodesData.label: Impact Assessment Suite
nodesData.tooltip: Environmental impact measurement and circularity analysis tools
